trial_identification.studytitle: menstrual cycle effects on perioperative thermoregulation in women
trial_identification.scientifictitle: Menstrual cycle effects on perioperative thermoregulation in women undergoing general anaesthesia

interventions.interventions: body temperature changes observed perioperatively during participants are under general anaesthesia and postanesthetic shivering seen at the end of the operation after extubation was evaluated by 4 degree scale in five minutes at recovery room.

primaryOutcome.outcome: peroperative body temparature changes monitored continuously with transdermal heat probes.
primaryOutcome.timepoint: monitored continuously when participant is under general anaesthesia

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Postanesthetic shivering was evaluated by 4 degree scale
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: at the end of the operation after extubation

eligibility.inclusivecriteria: women ages between 18-45 who received general anesthesia for elective surgey

sponsorship.primarysponsoraddress: Istanbul Research and Education Hospital Kasap Ilyas district Org.Abdurrahman Nafiz Gurman street Postal code:34098 FATIH/ ISTANBUL

ethicsAndSummary.summary: perioperative thermoregulation and postanesthetic shivering grade were observed in women who received general ansthesia
